COLUMBIA UNIVERSITY

LION DANCE

WHO WE ARE

Columbia University Lion Dance (CULD) is a student-run group founded in the fall of 2000 with the help of the Columbia University Chinese Students Club (CSC) in New York City. Our style of lion dancing was first shaped by Tony Chuy’s Northern Mantis School & carries influences of Hung Gar & Southern Mantis foundations from contributions by our more experienced members.
